website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular pair packs a punch with a maximum-strength formula.
pros: Comes in a cost-effective pack of 2
Maximum strength capsules at 10,000 mcg offer far more biotin than most other biotin products
cons: A few older women claimed the product grew unwanted hair on the face

customer_reviews.title: *WARNING* Biotin is great for strengthening nails
customer_reviews.text: *WARNING* Biotin is great for strengthening nails, growing hair etc. however, taking more than the recommended dose has the potential to cause cystic acne. That’s what happened to me (didn’t appear on chin until 4 months after taking 1 pill daily) I couldn’t figure out what was going on. I even took antibiotics to see if my cystic acne would clear up— but that didn’t work. The only thing that worked was when I stopped taking so much biotin. My advice is to you guys is to take the recommended daily dose which DEFINITELY isn’t 10,000mcg— it’s 2,500mcg. More is definitely NOT good in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Spellacy

customer_reviews.title: My first miracle product
customer_reviews.text: I am 24 years old and have dealt with female patterned hair loss since I was 14 years old. It ruined my confidence so much and I have tried countless hair pills and shampoos (ex: Hair Essentials pills, Nioxin shampoo). Of course we all have different type of hair, so naturally different products work for all of us. But as a young woman who has dealt with hair loss so early, this is a miracle product for me!! Even my friends and family have complimented me on how much thicker my hair has gotten, because they have seen how thin it was before. Take a look at the photos March 7, 2017 vs June 9, 2017
customer_reviews.author: Shabnam

customer_reviews.title: I've gone through 1 bottle which is 100 tablets so ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through 1 bottle which is 100 tablets so I've been taking Biotin for 100 days now. I got my haircut today and my hairstylist asked me what I've been doing to my hair because it looks fuller, thicker and healthier. its official, this is now part of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this exactly 2 months. My nails have been soft and brittle all my life. I also work with my hands, so my nails get ragged right down to the nail bed. I purchased this really for my hair though. It was falling out possibly from stress. I think it's maybe too soon to see if it's doing anything for my hair (I'll update in a few months) but my nails are hard as steel and grow long quite quickly. I have to file them down once or twice a week. I'll use this product forever.
customer_reviews.author: Random Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Made a significant improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Biotin has made a significant improvement in the thickness and strength of my hair. After radiation treatments due to cancer, I was losing my hair to the point that I was seriously considering buying a wig to hide the bare areas. My hairdresser suggested Biotin and dashed to the store to buy some. Being unsure of the proper dosage, I started with 1,000 mg - then, after seeing some improvement, increased it to 5,000 mg. After several more weeks of improvement, I decided 10,000 mg would work even better - IT HAS! My hair hasn't been this thick and strong in decades - I even decided to let it grow to a new hairstyle and I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Results speak for themselves
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from polycystic ovary syndrome and was having serious issues with hair loss on the top of my head. I had been resorting to comb overs to hide the balding spots on the top of my head. I have now been taking one biotin pill nightly and my hair loss problem has basically been eradicated. I am including a picture of my results. The picture on the left is from July 1, 2016 and the picture on the right is October 13, 2016. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQNC

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT !!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this biotin because I read that it helped hair from falling out. Well, IT WORKS ! I had been noticing quite a bit of hair on my comb/brush everytime I combed my hair after washing it (long hair), and there was so much hair in the comb ! Well, I started using the biotin and after about a couple of months there was very noticeable less hair falling out. It's been 6 months now and there's some hair, but a whole lot less ! I will keep taking the biotin as it has helped me TREMENDOUSLY !!! Give it a try. You can't go wrong by trying it ! BLESSINGS TO YOU ALL !!!
customer_reviews.author: Latina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Iv been seeing reviews on allergic reactions like skin rash and ache
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for two (2) Weeks now and i notice a big change in how fast my nails and hair grew. Iv been seeing reviews on allergic reactions like skin rash and ache. I haven't notice any of these side effect. Make sure to take this with a meal because it tough on the stomach and taking it with food ease it out. Make sure to also drink plenty of water. Biotin is a water soluble and the excess can be washed away by the body. I'd recommend this for anyone trying to grow hair and nails.
customer_reviews.author: Hermanly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Comparison
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Biotin about 6 months ago. I started with a Walgreens brand and then was attracted to the pricing of this multipack. That said, I have noticed that during the time I took the Walgreens biotin my nails and hair were increasingly stronger and healthier. However, the difference in taking this brand to the Walgreens brand is alarming. My nails lost strength on this product. It almost felt like I wasn’t really taking biotin at all. I will not be using the 2nd bottle. I will go back to the Walgreens version.
customer_reviews.author: K. Potter

customer_reviews.title: I've been taking this product for 2 weeks and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for 2 weeks and I'm already seeing some results. I notice I have a lot more fly-aways on the top of my head. I am 28 years old and really noticed how much more of my scalp I could see when sunlight hit my scalp. This product has shown some regrowth... i still have a bit of hair fall out but I can see the hair growing back.. something I wasn't seeing before I took this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjust dosage if acne-prone
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with thinning hair. Within 2-3 weeks of taking it my hair is thicker when I part it. Note however, that this dosage can trigger breakouts if you are acne prone - which started happening with me after about 2 weeks. My recommendation: from the first time you notice acne stop for a few days or until is clears, then reduce the dosage to 1/2 per day (the tablets are easily cut with a knife). Works fine... just be careful and make adjustments if you are acne prone.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Sick as a dog
customer_reviews.text: These pills made me sick as a dog! I have never experienced any side effects taking vitamins or supplements (and I have taken biotin before). The first 2-3 days I took these pills I had pounding headaches so I stopped taking for a few days. I decided to give it one more try and took another pill but I woke up in the middle of the night nauseous, sick to my stomach & toilet bound. I'm now stuck with 2 bottles of pills I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: DC COMO

customer_reviews.title: No Sign of Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Thought getting 2 bottles would not only be cost effective but give the supplement time to show signs of improvement. I'm almost finished with the 2nd bottle and have not notice any difference in my nails, skin, or hair. My nails, the purpose of my purchasing the item, are still very thin and weak.
customer_reviews.author: Mixdplate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, until they changed it
customer_reviews.text: Not even four days in and there was a noticeable difference in my scalp. I suffer a bald patch from malnutrition and a photosensitivity. This is reversing that and I am getting my hair back. Works much better than lower-dose pills. UPDATE: Strawberry flavored now? Where's plain? I don't want artificials or even natural sugar added to my supplement. I can't handle sugar. Looks like I have to find a new supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Lycantis

customer_reviews.title: Huge Breakout!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has caused my skin to break out terribly. Not just a bump here or there but knots on my face! This is very unfortunate because I do believe that the product could work but I cant walk around with my face looking like this. I read an article that explained why people experience breakouts when taking Biotin and how Biotin and B5 work together, you might want to do some research. But I'm going to call it a loss and throw these things away.. my face hurts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fur in the wrong place
customer_reviews.text: All these amazing reviews on how their hair grew like weeds... mine grew yes ,but crazy fast? No 😔,not at all. I also grew extra fur on my face, arms, back.... all in the wrong places. My hair didn't slow down on shedding. Which really surprised me. In addition, Broke me out so bad I'm scarred on my face. My sister swears by this brand and dosage unfortunately I can't.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Longer hair, nails, and my HEELS are healed!
customer_reviews.text: Since I began taking this I have noticed that my hair is growing faster, my nails are long and strong, and my HEELS have cleared up! I didn't expect this to help with this...but my heels were very dry, cracked, and white...and I mean deeply cracked...and after taking this for about 2 months....they are completely healed! I'd like to add that I have been taking this while breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!  Results after 1 month!
customer_reviews.text: Just put in an order for a second batch! After using these daily for only 4 weeks along with using an egg/coconut oil hair mask once a week I can definitely see a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Plushko

customer_reviews.title: Hair Strengthining!
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works. I've been taking this for a few months now. I notice thicker and better quality hair. I recommend this for daily use for those having thinning hair or a receding hairline.
customer_reviews.author: MENOZE

customer_reviews.title: Healthier but not longer hair!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I cut my hair and was really sad about it, so I bought this to try and grow it out again faster. I will say my hair has not grown all that much, and I’ve been taking it probably 3 months now every day. BUT, my hair did feel significantly healthier after just a month. It was so much softer and looked waaaaay smoother and shinier. I would recommend this to someone for healthy hair but don’t expect it to make your hair magically grow 10x faster.
customer_reviews.author: EVan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this Biotin for about a year now and after purchasing my last refill I figured I should finally write a review. I do notice a difference in my nails when I am not taking my biotin regularly, and more importantly I notice that my hair falls out less. There are tons of brands on amazon but I like this particular brand because of the high dosage which my doctor said would be safe/effective. These pills are small and easy to digest for my stomach, which tends to be on the sensitive side. I'll continue to use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I don't care what color as long as it is there!
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived on time and in perfect condition. I am a 75 year old male and still have a full head of grey/silver hair. In fact, I tie my hair in a pony tail which is now shoulder length. Do I attribute this fact to my taking biotin? Most males in my family on both sides were bald in their 40s so I will continue taking this as well as multi vitamins. Better safe then sorry! Good health to you all.
customer_reviews.author: Silver fox

customer_reviews.title: i was skeptical because nothing has worked. my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: i was skeptical because nothing has worked. my hair has been falling out for years and seemed to stop growing at a certain length. ive been using these for almost 7 months and my hair is actually growing! i have baby hairs growing from my hairline and on top of my head. and its growing faster! i dont have to be embarrassed of a thin ponytail anymore! i will keep using this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jenn t.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good brand of Biotin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for maintenance of my nails. It does not appear to be working as efficiently and effectively as other brands of biotin. My nails, while using other brands of biotin, do not crack and break. While using this brand they break and crack. I am going to purchase a different brand next time. I'm not going to purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Thawyzard

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost done with the second bottle and have noticed absolutely no change in my hair thickness, length, growth or health. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McElwain

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after trying a different biotin pill 2 months prior and seeing amazing results. Big mistake!! I had to take 2 pills with the the other brand so I thought that 1 pill a day plus 2 bottles was an awesome deal...it is, but does nothing for me. I'm sad I have so many but I will be going back to the other "hair" pill.. this one does grow my hair or nails like the other...
customer_reviews.author: teisha

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product successfully until a purchase a few months ago. I think this company has a quality control problem- my hair fell out wholesale and my nails deteriorated markedly. I noticed the problem wasn't a deterioration in my health when I started the current batch: ie my hair loss slowed considerably. We’ll see if my nails improve. Buyer beware. I wrote to the company outlining the problem but have not received the curtesy of a reply. Perhaps, like most drugs and supplements they are made in China. Next time I will only purchase product that is tested and affiliated with ConsumerLab that tests supplements for quality. Membership is worth the price and more.
customer_reviews.author: Enid Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I take these daily along with Vitafusion Hair, Skin, & Nails gummy vitamins and these are my results. It grew a LOT in only two months and I'm very happy about it. I decided to provide a picture of my hair cut too because you can see how much thicker it's gotten too. I used to have an undercut which is why my ends look weird in the first two pics and why I bad to cut it. Now I can finally begin growing my hair for real.
customer_reviews.author: Jozlyn Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Good but definitely cut them in half to avoid head pain
customer_reviews.text: good item, as advertised, DEFINITELY causes acne and headaches, like the kind that pound on your head and keep you up at night. solved the problem by cutting them in half and just take half a pill every day. less dosage but no headaches and hair still GROWS! advice: get a little pill cutter and chop em in half. still strong and no headaches!!
customer_reviews.author: er

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and have been taking them every day for about three weeks . I have noticed about a extra inch on my hair already! Im super happy! One of my guy friends is trying to grow his hair out long, so i bought him 2 bottles as well. He also has noticed at peast a inch in his first 2 weeks as well. Only bad thing is that your nails also grow like crazy so if your like my with acrylic nails. Well u know
customer_reviews.author: Shandi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Causes severe breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of biotin but ever since is started taking this, I’ve broken out so bad. Like cystic acne around my jaw line and pimples all over my scalp. It’s painful. I stopped taking it. I didn’t see any difference besides acne really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent hair loss
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find this product at a reasonable price. I have a disease that can cause hair loss and I've been taking these for about two years. I stopped taking them for a short time because I wasn't sure they were helping but soon after I stopped I noticed more hair loss so they definitely help prevent hair loss but it has not helped me regrow hair. I also did notice my nails are longer and stronger. I have not noted any benefits to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Biotin works
customer_reviews.text: I was highly skeptical about Biotin claims, but after two months the evidence is there to show it grows thicker hair and like it or not hair in places you did not have hair before. Head and beard hair growth show noticeable improvement and I definitely have more chest hair than I had two months ago. Possibly experiencing some skin rash from use, but nothing too objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this regularly for over 6 months, and my hair is growing back thicker and stronger; even starting to grow hair on my bald spots. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter who has psoriosis. The doctor recommended it for her at the highest dose since she has a low immunity and this will help her hair, skin and nails. She likes it so far and has seen some improvement but she does have a severe case so it might be an entire bottle before she sees major improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Felix/ John Pytel

customer_reviews.title: Going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few weeks now and I have noticed my nails grow a lot faster and thicker, my beard is looking fuller and growing more evenly and the hair that was thinning on my head has slowed down, I am hoping with continued use the hair will start to regrow again. So far this is great you get a lot for the money and these are maximum strength. I have not had any negative side affects like breakouts or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin A. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: My hair grew a centimeter in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I've damaged my hair so much over the past few years. It just doesn't grow as fast as it should. Maybe a inch every 6 months or so. I started taking this about three weeks ago. My hair has grown about a centimeter. That's not much compared to other women's results but that's a lot to me! I also noticed that my hair seemed thicker. The only thing I don't like about this product is that it breaks me out sooooo bad. I drink plenty of water and have also tried taking a vitamin with it but it still breaks me out. But honestly ill take a few pimples if that means longer healthier hair. lol (Real Review)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biotin
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for about 3 weeks now. My hope was that my nails would quit splitting and that it would help my hair from falling out at least a little bit. So far that has not worked well. However, like I said, it's only been 3 weeks. I'll get back to you if I see any improvement... A couple months later I'm ready to finish my comment; my hair is improving and my nails are now long enough and strong enough to scratch things :) !!!
customer_reviews.author: motormthmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, incredible results
customer_reviews.text: With supplements like these that you see at best incremental results, the proof was truly in the pudding on these. Only a few months into taking these, I can already see a difference in the strength of my hair and nails. The pills are small and manageable, and are highly concentrated. The value in terms of my per unit of Biotin cost was also the best around.
customer_reviews.author: Lunatic

customer_reviews.title: Natrol Biotin Tablets
customer_reviews.text: Hello I ordered the Biotin hair pills and I wasn't sure if I would be able to take them not a pill taker but, Once I received my order the pill is actually the size of a baby aspirin. I have been taking the pills for about 30 days the first week I began to see results in the crown area of my head where I have thin hair loss. After 30 days of taking them the area is covered with hair still thin but it has hair before it wasn't any hair at all. I recommend this product and I will continue to order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette McCowin

customer_reviews.title: My nails are amazing now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My fingernails have always been very thin and broke easily. I have been using this product for about a year now and cannot believe how thick and strong my nails have become! I am able to grow them long and beautiful for the first time in my life! Many people actually think their acrylics!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Natrol is a good product. I have been purchasing my supplements at ...
customer_reviews.text: Natrol is a good product. I have been purchasing my supplements at a health store. One day I decided to see what the cost difference was if I ordered them through Amazon. What a great surprise! I am able to get my supplements at a reduced amount and thanks to Prime - do not pay shipping. This is wonderful for me because the health store I used to shop at is 45 minutes away - one way. The Natrol Biotin has been helpful with my nails and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.

customer_reviews.title: Price, price, price .....
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the category of Absorbancy, to review. How can a consumer know how they are absorbed? Other than that, they are very good, easy to swallow (I can’t swallow big pills, etc). Since they are the same as the much more expensive brand name Biotin sold by my local pharmacy, why would this not be my choice? Also, I trust Amazon to not sell anything questionable or not up to par. So, of course I bought these with full confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Not A Lot Of Money "Mom"

customer_reviews.title: Slight differences in hair growth
customer_reviews.text: For a pretty high dosage of biotin, I was kind of expecting a bigger change but it's different from person to person. Both my boyfriend and I have been taking these supplements. I see slight improvement in his hair but not much. I think it's important to note that he does not take these consistently. However, I took them very consistently for a few months and haven't noticed any difference. I've since stopped taking them and just give them to my boyfriend since it does something for him.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: I've always had pretty healthy nails
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I noticed my hair seemed to be thinning. I've used this for approximately a month and I have REALLY noticed a difference in my nails. I've always had pretty healthy nails, but since I've started taking this Biotin supplement, they grow really fast and are much stronger. I've already recommended this to several friends based on my experience. Unfortunately, I haven't really noticed a difference with my hair, but that's not as easy to notice a change with. I hope to notice a difference and will post an update if I do:)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Landuyt

customer_reviews.title: These really have helped my hair and nails  30 to 100 mcg per day
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 and have almost waist-length hair. After I stopped coloring it and let it go grey, it became very healthy again; nevertheless, I was alarmed to see I was losing a handful of it every time I combed it. My nails were also in bad shape, so I started taking Biotin every day. It took about 6 months to see results, but my hair loss has finally stopped and my nails are healthy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hume

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Delayed Onset Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I just want to warn everyone that about a week after taking 10,000 mcgs a day of biotin I developed horrible headaches which resolved the day after I stopped the supplement. I read so many reviews on Amazon and none mentioned headache as a side effect but I found a forum where many people complained of getting a headache after using biotin. Unfortunately I can't use the supplement and I was really looking forward to after having half my head shaved for several brain surgeries and thinning hair due to a thyroid disorder. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: ErinM

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I had to start cutting in half. The full dosage was causing me to break out around my jaw line. I ever hardly have problems with pimples. Its been fine since I started taking half a pill a day. I have notice that my hair and nails seem to be growing faster.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great results
customer_reviews.text: Biotin is such an important element needed for our bodies, especially as we age. It is also helpful for a woman when she is going through the change of life lol, because our bodies become so depleted of necessary minerals and nutrients. This is where this product has proven itself! I was losing hair and my nails were greatly affected becoming dry and brittle. I have had nothing but great results with this product. My hair again looks fuller and healthier and my nails are back to normal!
customer_reviews.author: Thankful Helpmeet!

customer_reviews.title: My neck broke out....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because a co-worker told me Biotin would be great for my hair and nails (I'm getting married in May). However, the back of my neck started breaking out shortly after I started using this. It took me a couple of weeks to figure out WHY and WHAT changed in my diet, detergents, etc. I googled Acne and Biotin and came across a lot of articles explaining why and how acne can be caused by pure biotin. My neck cleared up shortly after I stopped using it. My return window closed or I would be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: JennL

customer_reviews.title: I read that Biotin was great for hair loss and have been using this product ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works! I'm 61 and have had loss of hair for sometime. I've used a hair regrowth product but didn't feel that the results were not as positive as I wished. I read that Biotin was great for hair loss and have been using this product now for 4 1/2 months and have seen results already and not just light fluffy hairs but real strong hairs. This is in my forever list.
customer_reviews.author: Denice T.

customer_reviews.title: ... whether or not this product is actually doing any good or not
customer_reviews.text: Can't prove whether or not this product is actually doing any good or not, but it does seem like it's working to some degree for me, and I'm definitely not having any 'side-effects'. Been taking one per day for about 3 weeks to help 'jumpstart' a new beard. My facial hair grows thick and fast regardless but at a month of growth I feel like I'm a little farther along than I would be without. I'll continue to take it until/unless I have any sort of issues with it or until I don't find it necessary anymore. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Jayemaych

customer_reviews.title: Biotin as a lifesaver for hair loss!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking biotin because I read it could help hair loss. It is a miracle cure! I’m on medication that caused a lot of hair loss and now I have only normal hair loss. I did have to raise it from 5000 to 10,000 IU because I raise the medication but it’s safe because it’s water-soluble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wished they would have worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading reviews about how it strengthened nails and hair for some. Did not work for me at all. Not everything works the same for everyone. Took these as directed for over a month with no noticeable difference. The only reason I gave them more than 1 star is they arrived on time, packaging was in tact and they are small and easy to swallow. But that's not enough reason to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am on my second bottle of this. I must say I was skeptical that I would see results as I have been taking biotin for over a year. Something about this one is different. Everyone has noticed a difference in the thickness of my hair. It has been transformed. I have thyroid disease and have struggled with thinning hair for about 5 years. This stuff is incredible. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: vix

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these faithfully for about 4 weeks. I can honestly say they work. After second knee replacement, I noticed my nails were soft, had ridges and would peel in the center of mail. I read an article about Biotin and looked for them on Amazon. After the end of week 3, I started to notice a difference. My nails are stronger, whiter and grow very fast. I will be ordering more and spreading the news. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Thicker hair in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Natrol Biotin for several weeks now and have has a few people comment that my hair seems to be getting thicker. These individuals are unaware that I am taking this supplement so it's an honest opionion. I began taking it because I have always had thin hair and migrain medications are not helping my plight. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: purplepassion

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 6 weeks and it has made my hair so strong, shiny and soft! Today the lady cutting my hair mentioned how beautiful it was. It hasn't done much for my nails, but I didn't buy it for that. I highly recommend for making your hair voluminous. I can even go longer without washing my hair and it doesn't look oily or dead.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't worked yet
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for only two weeks and haven't noticed a difference in my hair texture yet. I've never had a problem with my nails, they've always been strong, but after chemo, although I was lucky to not lose all my hair, it became very dry and brittle. I finished chemo 7 months ago and my hair is still breaking every time I comb it, even though I use a wide tooth comb. On the bright side, I'm still around to complain about it, so it's all about attitude. Still working on that!
customer_reviews.author: Wisteria

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive packaging - one third full
customer_reviews.text: Very strange packaging. I have no complaint about the product, but each container is less than one third full. First picture shows a single content. Second picture shows both containers together, still about two-thirds filled. Why not put 250 tablets into one bottle. Be honest and green in packaging
customer_reviews.author: Willowmere

customer_reviews.title: The best & efficient !
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for months. They’re simple, small, no taste, and keeps my hair growing! This is in conjunction to a balanced diet, exercise, Deep conditioners. Hair treatments, and other vitamins I take for hair growth and overall wellness. Hair growth tip - combine biotin and primrose oil . Take together. ❤️ Love these biotin pills and they’re a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this product I did see reviews where people mentioned that their skin broke out. I was hoping I would be one of those people that wouldn't happen to, unfortunately after 2 months is usage my has been extremely oily and breaking out like crazy. I gave the other bottle to my mother and she's also experiencing uncontronable itching all over her body. So just beware before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 years old and started taking the Biotin after other supplements failed to help my hair loss and problem skin. Biotin has helped me SO much. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: kodasmom

customer_reviews.title: ALLERGIC REACTION NEW INGREDIENTS
customer_reviews.text: THEY MUST HAVE CHANGED THE INGREDIENTS BECAUSE My whole body is itching and it’s very uncomfortable. From my head and hair to my toes and feet. I have since stopped taking it and destroying what Inhave left of this product. Extremely upset and this reaction is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Taurean Mcdade

customer_reviews.title: He looks amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 5days now taking one a day. Noticed the scalp itching as stated in one of the testimonies. My hair is cut short just above neck. The top part that is long is getting growth! My hair is normally this and has been for years since little. Have purchased products to try and thicken hair but to no avail. My hair now has body and thickness. Looking forward to 6mths. I want to put it in a pony tail or micro braids. I am African/Native American for those who can relate. I also have a referred friend who has been taking Biotin for past 2yrs. He now has his own dreadlocks!! WoW!! He looks amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Nails are growing more rapidly and stronger.
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking them for a little while and am about half way through the bottle. I have noticed my fingernails and toenails growing much more rapidly. My fingernails are a little bit stronger but not as strong as I would like them to be. I am hoping with more continuous use that this will also improve. I have not noticed any difference in my hair but didn't buy it for that purpose and have not been monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NOTE: The description of this product is different than the biotin product I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: The description of this product is different than the biotin product I purchased. The original biotin product I purchased was a good quality and very effective in helping to restore my hair. Unfortunately, since the product description changed I don’t have a screenshot of what the original product looked like.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this...I have 100% seen improvement in my hair's thickness. Like most reviews it does make me break out but only when I don't drink enough water but if I do and take them then I don't. I started slowly one every other day and now everyday. I'm loving it. I will be done with the second bottle and will most definitely be ordering another pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tamanna

customer_reviews.title: I've already recommended this to family members with similar thinning hair issues
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review so I had time to evaluate if this product was as advertised. The results are definitely positive. I've notice less hair loss and see some new growth, even my finger nails are growing stronger. If you're having any of these issues, I'd try it. I didn't notice any side effects except the positive ones. I've already recommended this to family members with similar thinning hair issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grows my hair super fast, doesn't cause me acne, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and tried them out, and everytime I took them I noticed a significant increase in the growth of my hair, when I stopped taking them my hair seemed to grow slower than it normally does, maybe a side effect??? I've never had acme taking these either which is a major plus But, I don't normally suffer from acne anyways. According to labdoor, these are one of the highest ranked biotin pills in every category including absorbancy, so for the money and the amount you get it's completely worth it. Do your research and check out labdoor! They do lab tests on vitamins and different health related to things to determine potency, purity and more
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen more growth throughout my hair, significant amount of growth! My hair seen more growth compared to when i was using nothing. I started off taking 1 until month 3 when I started taking 2 until month 5 and now I'm taking 1 which I feel grows it quicker I started taking this in February and now it's September so about 7-8 months
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Product for its price, It also contains Calcium(absorption properties) unlike other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jover

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: I started growing new baby hairs within a week of taking this. However, I sliced these tablets in half so I was basically taking 5000 mcg per day (I experimented with 10,000 aka the full tablet and I broke out). If you don't wanna break out, I suggest buying the neocell collagen powder and taking that too with it. Plus, try taking this with hot liquids like tea or coffee so that it dissolves quicker. But yeah, it's working
customer_reviews.author: Syed Rizvi

customer_reviews.title: Helps Grow Your Hair Faster
customer_reviews.text: I take this to help me grow my hair quicker. It seems to help speed things up. Be sure to drink lots of water, will dehydrate you otherwise. Still hasn't helped me grow facial hair quicker. For me has the unwanted effect of making my nails grow quicker as well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Only Natrol 10,000 for ME!!
customer_reviews.text: Biotin is a necessary vitamin if you want to ensure hair and nail growth and to put into your system those necessary to achieve that goal. I'm not sure if I have purchased from this particular vendor before or not .... as I can't see my past order but I love the Natrol Biotin ..1) it's one of the hightest strengths, having 10,000 mcg. whereas most that you get in the stores are between 1,000 and 5,000. It's also a tiny, tiny pill to swallow unlike some of them who look like elongated kidney beans and you have to literally choke it down to get it down. I will continue to buy these as long as Amazon carries them....
customer_reviews.author: Journey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the high end brand I was getting, this one is a great competitor. It grows out my nails stronger than the brand formual I was using and I'm noticing new little hairs on the top of my head. Love this product - I've been using this for about five months and I'm definitely coming back to it once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko G.

customer_reviews.title: The pills are pretty small. The product seems to be working well
customer_reviews.text: The pills are pretty small. The product seems to be working well. The only problem is that when I began talking the pills, I broke out like crazy. It wasn't progressive, the acne came all at once. Not only that I also started to get back acne :( I am not sure if these side effects are just for me, but no one else in the comments said anything about acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hair has stopped falling out, it has taken about ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair has stopped falling out, it has taken about 2 months for me to notice that my hair was not everywhere, it every sink, in the dog's mouths, in the vacuum cleaning head and so on............will never stop taking these............EVER !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: At the brink of menopause, it's important to have ...
customer_reviews.text: At the brink of menopause, it's important to have supplements that help with my energy levels and mental clarity. This biotin does just that. I take one first thing in the morning with my water and it gives me that extra boost to get going.
customer_reviews.author: mz.t

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find in my local stores
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Amazon because this dosage was getting hard to find in my local stores. I can tell a difference in my skin more so than nails and hair. Overall, I think this supplement is beneficial and like the two/pack option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 inches I think it’s pretty awesome. Even though I need like 8 more ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this since October 14th my hair has grown about 2.5 inches it’s now January 18th .. 3 months and 2.5 inches I think it’s pretty awesome. Even though I need like 8 more inches to go. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh from NJ

customer_reviews.title: They really do work..
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of Biotin, within days I notice my nails strengthening and growing longer. As for my hair, I do see my hair falling out a lot less and it grows long. I’ve tried another brand that contained coconut oil with the biotin and it sucked, no results whatsoever. I tossed those out and went back to my original bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic☺️

customer_reviews.title: How the order is placed for quantity. Make sure you change it to one before you order.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a enough time to say if it works yet but I do know that when you order it is misleading because you think you order just two bottles but when you click on it they have you order four bottles. This is very misleading and should be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: From Hair to Hair
customer_reviews.text: Since using this product, I have noticed my fingernails are clearer and stronger. I just trimmed my hair last week; so, I am waiting to see how quickly it grows back. Professional hair stylists suggest hair should grow up to an inch a month under the proper conditions. Today I am going to straighten my hair with a flat iron for a length check. We will soon see.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin is a miracle worker. I am an African American woman with mixed textured hair that for a really long time, one section of my hair would not curl. For years it just grew straight. I started taking these vitamins and my hair grew, and grew back curly. I am sooooo happy overall. My nails grow fast as well. I've been keeping my hair in protective styles and my hair is growing super long. It's really worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Khayri Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Had much better results with the neocell biotin bursts from vitamin shoppe
customer_reviews.text: This 10,000 does not work as well as other 10,000 biotin products I’ve used in the past. I’ll finish out the bottles but will not be purchasing again. Had much better results with the neocell biotin bursts from vitamin shoppe. These were a much cheaper option.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: My face broke out with literally 1,000's of little bumps, some with whiteheads. I couldn't figure out what or why this was happening and then it occurred to me that the only thing that's changed was this brand of Biotin. I've always taken it because it's great for hair, nails and skin, I guess just not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adenton67

customer_reviews.title: The Biotin itself is a good product for me - it works
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in 2 days via USPS (PRIME Member - Vendor: NATROL). The Biotin itself is a good product for me - it works. Being a cancer patient, the Biotin is countering the side effects of brittle nails and thinning hair/loss of hair. If you have cancer and undergoing CHEMO, give Biotin a shot. It looks like everything AMAZON sells is going up in price - this was $2.84 cheaper the last time I ordered this back in NOV 2014! Today Biotin is selling for $1.26 more than when I ordered this last week! It's like watching the gasoline prices (LOL)!
customer_reviews.author: cajunjake

customer_reviews.title: Try this supplement .... It works !!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Biotin daily for years ... It's a great supplements that helps strengthen my hair and decreased shedding ... I've also encouraged my daughters to use and they are also happy with performance !! It takes time to see a difference as everybody is different so please be patient .. You won't regret !!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hennigan

customer_reviews.title: These are smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for a over three months and I have not seen any major improvement but these are easier to swallow and has about the same effect as they bigger ones with smaller mg.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: My hair is also very fine! My friend told me to take biotin it ...
customer_reviews.text: For years my hair would not grow!! It would always stay the same length! People would tell me to cut a few inches every month so it could grow!! But every time I cut it , it would only grow to same length that it would be before I cut it!! My hair is also very fine! My friend told me to take biotin it took me while to decide to take it! After only 1 week of taking it I noticed the difference!! My hair is getting shiny and starting to look healthier and starting to grow!! I can't wait to see the results after one month!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I feel that my hair is getting stronger and fuller. I was losing my hair due to stress..within 2 weeks I noticed my hair was no longer falling out or breaking. I also had a coworker use it bc her hair was super thin. We saw a big difference within a couple of weeks. Her hair looks fuller. I would def recommend using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super strong. Works great on me. If I take a whole pill. It makes me sleep the whole time and wake up refreshed and none drowsy. Some times I take half of it. For a quick refreshing nap
customer_reviews.author: Arleta

customer_reviews.title: Helps Strengthen Nails
customer_reviews.text: Before using Natrol Biotin at this high strength, my fingernails tended to flake and split as they grew out. I wear my nails short, but they were weak and hampered day-to-day activities. It didn't take long after I began taking the 10,000 mcg dose for them to improve. The only time I have a problem is when I don't plan ahead and run out of the supplements. Biotin must not be stored in the body because I soon see a decline in the condition of my nails. Incidentally, when I recently visited Churchill Downs, I noticed that large doses of biotin are given to the race horses to strenghten their hooves.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Works but caused me migraines.
customer_reviews.text: This did as advertised. My hair became really shiny and stronger (less breakage). Still had some split ends but not as many. And my hair (everywhere) grew faster. Took a couple of weeks to show results. However I would get migraines from taking it. I stopped taking it and the migraines ceased. Might be due to the high dosage. Won't be taking this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read it y
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for two years straight. I would say overall it helped my hair grow long but didn’t do anything to help my hair regrown in the areas I was shedding. I would recommend this for those who want to grow out their hair. If you have female pattern hair loss you may want to rethink this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Russo

customer_reviews.title: I love this biotin
customer_reviews.text: I love this biotin. I took two pills a day and I noticed my hair grow at a much faster rate and look a lot healthier! I also bought it for my friend who has a problem with thinning hair and he felt this product helped his hair with regrowth as well make his hair thicker. It is not a miracle worker however it does provide great benefit. I would give it about 3-4 weeks to notice a difference. WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Biotin is great
customer_reviews.text: I love using Biotin, I was experiencing hair loss, I'm not 100% sure that these are the full culprit of regain due to the various shampoos and getting off other medications, but I think they are helping.
customer_reviews.author: William White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow! It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I started taking biotin in Feb 2019 my hair has grow at least 7-9 inches. I always had a hard time growing my hair out. My hair is filler, thicker and longer! Definitely worth it! Easy to swallow tiny pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its working wonderfully. I bought this for my hair and it has helped alot. My hair a bit more thicker which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

product_meta.title: Natrol Biotin Beauty Tablets, Promotes Healthy Hair, Skin and Nails, Helps Support Energy Metabolism, Helps Convert Food Into Energy, Maximum Strength, 10,000mcg, 100 Count (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
Size:100 Count (Pack of 2)Biotin, a water-soluble B vitamin, acts as a coenzyme in the metabolism of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates.† Biotin is also known as vitamin H or B7 and not only helps to promote radiant skin, strong nails and heathy hair, but also aids in the conversion of daily food intake into natural energy.

Clinical studies indicate that those with deficiencies of biotin can experience brittle nails and hair loss. By taking Natrol Biotin daily, you can improve strength of nails, healthy hair and radiant skin.† Biotin supports the growth of cells and production of fatty acids which can increase the bulb size of hair follicles, which helps to make hair appear fuller and thicker.†

†These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: PROMOTES HEALTHY HAIR, SKIN & NAILS – Restore the health of your hair, radiance of your skin and strength of your nails with Natrol Biotin. an important B Vitamin that has long been known as a key element in maintaining healthy hair, skin and nails.
INCREASE ENGERY – Biotin, a B vitamin also known as vitamin H or B7 helps support the metabolism and assists in the conversion of food into energy.
ADVANCED FORMULATION – The beauty supplement includes an important B Vitamin that has long been known as a key element in maintaining healthy hair, skin and nails.
100% VEGETARIAN – Go ahead, nourish your inner beauty with Natrol Biotin.
